rsbNotes.title: Ps 70
rsbNotes.text: Ps. 70 This psalm is nearly identical with Ps. 40:13–17.

rsbNotes.title: Ps 70:title
rsbNotes.text: 70:title for the memorial offering. This title is used elsewhere only for Ps. 38.

rsbNotes.title: Ps 70:1
rsbNotes.text: 70:1 Make haste . . . to deliver me. In his desperate plight, the psalmist boldly asks the Lord to come to his rescue.

rsbNotes.title: Ps 70:2
rsbNotes.text: 70:2 be turned back and brought to dishonor. He wants the Lord to turn the tables on the enemy. They seek the psalmist’s ruin and his life; he asks God to ruin them.

rsbNotes.title: Ps 70:5
rsbNotes.text: 70:5 poor and needy. See 9:18 note.
